text: 59|10|evarkal ivarkalukkup pin vantarkalo, avarkal â€˜â€˜enkal iraivane! Enkalaiyum ni mannittarul! Enkalukku mun nampikkai konta enkal (muhajir, ancari) cakotararkalaiyum mannittarul! Anta nampikkai kontavarkalaip parri enkal ullankalil kurotankalai untu pannate! Enkal iraivane! Niccayamaka ni mika irakkamutaiyavan, maka karunaiyutaiyavan'' enru pirarttanai ceytukonte irukkinranar
